summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1279, for the improvement of North 43rd Street and East 43rd Street, from Stone Avenue to Brooklyn Avenue; North 45th Street and East 45th Street, from Woodland Park Avenue to 15th Avenue Northeast; and Interlake Avenue, from North 42nd Street to North 50th Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 13971 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
